ygData.subject: Dark Legion
ygData.msgSnippet: I have yet to be witness to any steal killing and do not support it within the guild.  If this is the case I would like you to tell me the names of the members
ygData.messageBody:
I have yet to be witness to any steal killing and do not support it within
the guild. If this is the case I would like you to tell me the names of the
members doing so. I have yet to see your character on EQ and I play quit a
bit. Also, so not accuse the whole guild of a crime that perhaps a member
or two have committed. We try to let in only fun members to the guild.
Like I said and our website says, Dark Legion DOES NOT SUPPORT KILL
STEALING. mail me with their names and I shall see that it is looked into.

Grumbel
